The claim made by Rep: Matt Gaetz that the Democratic Party had provisions in their 1992 platform regarding illegal immigrants committing felonies and returning to the country.
The fact: checking process conducted by the experts to verify the accuracy of Gaetz's claim.
The discovery that Gaetz: s claim was partially accurate, but he was off by one presidential cycle, as it was the 1996 Democratic Party platform that had strong language regarding illegal immigrants and their criminal activities.
The comparison between the 1992 and 1996: highlighting the difference in tone and stance on immigration and border security.
